title: Milk and beef
creator_credit: Hugh Baddeley Productions and W. Hugh Baddeley
brief_description: Provides a coverage of the milk and beef industries in England, from the grazing of cattle to the production of meat, dairy products and leather. Suitable for upper primary level.
